tool_description: Schedules order processing and fulfillment activities across warehouse operations to optimize throughput and meet delivery commitments.

target_ship_dates.description: Target ship dates for each order

order_priorities.description: Priority scores for each order (1-10, higher is more urgent)

processing_times.description: Estimated processing time in hours for each order

error_messages: Invalid warehouse ID: Warehouse identifier not recognized.
Array length mismatch: All arrays (order_ids, target_ship_dates, order_priorities, processing_times) must have the same length.
Invalid ship date format: All target ship dates must be in ISO 8601 date-time format.
Invalid priority: Order priorities must be integers between 1 and 10.
Invalid processing time: Processing times must be positive numbers.
Invalid staff count: Available staff must be a positive integer.
Scheduling conflict: Unable to schedule all orders within capacity constraints.
usage: Provide warehouse_id and matching arrays of order_ids, target_ship_dates, order_priorities, and processing_times. Optionally specify available_staff to adjust capacity calculations.

schedule_summary.description: Overall scheduling results and capacity utilization

delayed_orders.description: Orders that cannot meet target ship dates with delays
